__compat.description: The image-rendering CSS property sets an image scaling algorithm. The property applies to an element itself.

android.notes: only <image> and  background-image supports, it only applies to an element itself.

ios.notes: only <image> and  background-image supports, it only applies to an element itself.

web_lynx.notes: it applies to an element itself, to any images set in its other properties, and to its descendants.
